title: Left Naked, Reality Show Contestant Survived For 15 Months Eating Dog Food
content: Unaware that he was being filmed, he competed in challenges for basic survival. His story of loneliness and struggle is now featured in a documentary.
summary: Unaware that he was being filmed, he competed in challenges for basic survival. His story of loneliness and struggle is now featured in a documentary.

title: "America Going Bankrupt Super Fast": Elon Musk Offers Solution
content: Billionaire Elon Musk, tasked by President-elect Donald Trump to rein in the excessive US spending, has warned that America could be nearing the verge of bankruptcy.
summary: Billionaire Elon Musk, tasked by President-elect Donald Trump to rein in the excessive US spending, has warned that America could be nearing the verge of bankruptcy.

title: Court Respite For Musk After Market Regulator's Probe Into Twitter Takeover
content: A judge in the United States has rejected the request of the US Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) to sanction tech billionaire Elon Musk for skipping a meeting with the regulator, to watch one of his rockets launch.
summary: A judge in the United States has rejected the request of the US Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) to sanction tech billionaire Elon Musk for skipping a meeting with the regulator, to watch one of his rockets launch.

title: Horse's Head Terror Echoes The Godfather In Sicilian Mafia Intimidation
content: In a chilling Mafia-style warning, a severed horse's head was discovered on the property of a construction contractor in Altofonte, Sicily.
summary: In a chilling Mafia-style warning, a severed horse's head was discovered on the property of a construction contractor in Altofonte, Sicily.

title: G7 Ministers To Discuss ICC Warrant For Netanyahu Next Week: Italy PM Meloni
content: G7 ministers meeting in Italy next week will discuss the International Criminal Court's arrest warrant for Benjamin Netanyahu, Prime Minister Giorgia Meloni said Friday, saying the issue required further analysis
summary: G7 ministers meeting in Italy next week will discuss the International Criminal Court's arrest warrant for Benjamin Netanyahu, Prime Minister Giorgia Meloni said Friday, saying the issue required further analysis

title: Trudeau Calls Officials "Criminals" Over Fake Report On Indian Leadership
content: Amid heightened diplomatic tension with India, Canadian Prime Minister Justin Trudeau called his own intelligence officials 'criminals' for linking Prime Minister Narendra Modi and Foreign Minister Subrahmanyam Jaishankar to violence in Canada.
summary: Amid heightened diplomatic tension with India, Canadian Prime Minister Justin Trudeau called his own intelligence officials 'criminals' for linking Prime Minister Narendra Modi and Foreign Minister Subrahmanyam Jaishankar to violence in Canada.

title: Trudeau Confirms Canada Will Arrest Netanyahu After World Court Order
content: After the United Kingdom, Canada said it would "abide" by the arrest warrant issued against Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu by the International Criminal Court (ICC).
summary: After the United Kingdom, Canada said it would "abide" by the arrest warrant issued against Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu by the International Criminal Court (ICC).

title: NATO Chief Discusses 'Global Security' With Donald Trump
content: NATO chief Mark Rutte held talks with US President-elect Donald Trump in Florida on the "global security issues facing the alliance", a spokeswoman said.
summary: NATO chief Mark Rutte held talks with US President-elect Donald Trump in Florida on the "global security issues facing the alliance", a spokeswoman said.

title: Discovery Of Ancient Hot Water On Mars Indicator Of Its Habitable Past
content: Australian researchers have discovered the oldest direct evidence of hot water activity on Mars, revealing that the planet may have once been habitable.
summary: Australian researchers have discovered the oldest direct evidence of hot water activity on Mars, revealing that the planet may have once been habitable.

title: "Profoundly Saddened": Laos Government After 6 Tourists Die
content: Alcohol tainted with methanol, a toxic alcohol usually used in industrial and household products like antifreeze, is suspected to be the cause of the deaths.
summary: Alcohol tainted with methanol, a toxic alcohol usually used in industrial and household products like antifreeze, is suspected to be the cause of the deaths.

title: "Her Husband Kept Asking For Dowry": Sister Of Indian, 24, Found Dead In UK
content: Days after 24-year-old Harshita Brella - an Indian woman from Delhi living with her husband in the UK - was found dead with her body stashed away in the boot of a car, his family has pointed to a dowry angle in the case.
summary: Days after 24-year-old Harshita Brella - an Indian woman from Delhi living with her husband in the UK - was found dead with her body stashed away in the boot of a car, his family has pointed to a dowry angle in the case.

title: Nvidia To Balance "Compliance And Tech Advances" Under Trump Administration
content: Nvidia reported record-high quarterly revenue on the back of strong AI chip demand, though investors are wary of US-China tensions reheating during a new Trump term.
summary: Nvidia reported record-high quarterly revenue on the back of strong AI chip demand, though investors are wary of US-China tensions reheating during a new Trump term.

title: Indian Among 2 Convicted After Gujarati Family's Death On US-Canada Border
content: The United States has convicted two, including an Indian national, of charges related to Human smuggling after an Indian migrant family froze to death while attempting to cross the Canada-US border during a blizzard in 2022.
summary: The United States has convicted two, including an Indian national, of charges related to Human smuggling after an Indian migrant family froze to death while attempting to cross the Canada-US border during a blizzard in 2022.

title: Five Israeli Missiles Strike Residential Building In Heart Of Beirut
content: Five Israeli missiles struck a residential building in the heart of Beirut on Saturday, Lebanese state media reported.
summary: Five Israeli missiles struck a residential building in the heart of Beirut on Saturday, Lebanese state media reported.

title: In China, These Giant Sinkholes Are Tourist Spots. But Experts Flag Risks
content: China's massive sinkholes, particularly those in Guangxi province, have gained massive popularity among tourists, drawing visitors eager to explore their ancient ecosystems.
summary: China's massive sinkholes, particularly those in Guangxi province, have gained massive popularity among tourists, drawing visitors eager to explore their ancient ecosystems.

title: Bizarre Make-Up Trend Involving Hot Melted Glue Goes Viral In Japan
content: The trend has drawn criticism from netizens with many worried that some impressionable teenagers might harm themselves while using the hot glue.
summary: The trend has drawn criticism from netizens with many worried that some impressionable teenagers might harm themselves while using the hot glue.

title: Google Forced To Sell Chrome. Will It Be A Win For Rivals?
content: US antitrust lawyers are calling on a judge to force the sale of Google's Chrome browser to limit the company's market clout in a move that would shake up the internet giant.
summary: US antitrust lawyers are calling on a judge to force the sale of Google's Chrome browser to limit the company's market clout in a move that would shake up the internet giant.

title: "100% Not True": Jeff Bezos' Response To Elon Musk's Big US Election Claim
content: Jeff Bezos has reacted to Elon Musk's claim that the Amazon founder had advised people to sell their Tesla and SpaceX stocks because he expected Donald Trump to lose the US election.
summary: Jeff Bezos has reacted to Elon Musk's claim that the Amazon founder had advised people to sell their Tesla and SpaceX stocks because he expected Donald Trump to lose the US election.

title: Wealthy countries Agree To Raise COP29 Climate Deal To $300 Bllion: Report
content: $250 billion proposal for a deal, drafted by Azerbaijan's COP29 presidency on Friday, was panned by developing countries as insultingly low.
summary: $250 billion proposal for a deal, drafted by Azerbaijan's COP29 presidency on Friday, was panned by developing countries as insultingly low.

title: US Intel Flags Venezuelan Prison Gang's Growing Influence In 16 States
content: A notorious Venezuelan prison gang has established a presence in at least 16 US states, covering nearly half the nation's population, according to a recent internal intelligence memo from Homeland Security.
summary: A notorious Venezuelan prison gang has established a presence in at least 16 US states, covering nearly half the nation's population, according to a recent internal intelligence memo from Homeland Security.
